chapters.title: Kakku - कक्कू
chapters.content: This chapter is about Kakku, a bird with unique traits. It introduces children to the world of nature through fun and creative storytelling.

chapters.title: Shekhibaaz Makkhi - शेखीबाज़ मक्खी
chapters.content: A story of a boastful fly who learns a valuable lesson. It helps children understand the consequences of boasting.

chapters.title: Chand Wali Amma - चाँद वाली अम्मा
chapters.content: A touching tale of the moon's influence on a mother and child. This chapter emphasizes the beauty of relationships and the magical elements of nature.

chapters.title: Man Karta Hai - मन करता है
chapters.content: A story that captures a child's desire to do things and explore the world around them. It connects with young minds who are full of curiosity.

chapters.title: Bahadur Bitto - बहादुर बित्तो
chapters.content: This chapter tells the story of a brave little boy, Bitto, who faces challenges with courage and determination.

chapters.title: Moos Ki Majduri - मूस की मजदूरी
chapters.content: This chapter narrates the story of a mouse who does hard work for a living, teaching children the value of hard work.

chapters.title: Humse Sab Kehte - हमसे सब कहते
chapters.content: A story that portrays the wisdom and advice elders give to children, encouraging them to learn from life experiences.

chapters.title: Tiptipva - टिपटिपवा
chapters.content: This chapter tells a whimsical story about a small creature, teaching children how even the tiniest things can make a big difference.

chapters.title: Bandar Baant - बन्दर बाँट (Part 1)
chapters.content: This part introduces a funny story about monkeys dividing fruits among themselves, illustrating the importance of fairness.

chapters.title: Bandar Baant - बन्दर बाँट (Part 2)
chapters.content: The continuation of the Bandar Baant story, where the monkeys learn a lesson about sharing and kindness.

chapters.title: Kab Aaun - कब आऊँ (Part 1)
chapters.content: This chapter narrates a child's longing to meet someone, teaching children the emotions tied to waiting and longing.

chapters.title: Kab Aaun - कब आऊँ (Part 2)
chapters.content: The second part of the story, where the child waits for a loved one to return, emphasizing patience and love.

chapters.title: Kyonjimal Aur Kaise Kaisliya - क्योंजीमल और कैसे कैसलिया
chapters.content: A playful story about a character named Kyonjimal, who learns through a series of funny and relatable situations.

chapters.title: Meera Behan Aur Bagh - मीरा बहन और बाघ (Part 1)
chapters.content: The first part of this chapter introduces a courageous girl named Meera who faces challenges with bravery.

chapters.title: Meera Behan Aur Bagh - मीरा बहन और बाघ (Part 2)
chapters.content: The conclusion of Meera’s brave encounter with the tiger, teaching children about courage and determination.

chapters.title: Kahani Ki Kahani - कहानी की कहानी
chapters.content: This is a story about a story itself, making children realize the importance of stories and imagination in everyday life.

chapters.title: Jab Mujhe Sanp Ne Kata - जब मुझे साँप ने काटा
chapters.content: A story about a boy who gets bitten by a snake, and his adventure of healing and understanding nature.

chapters.title: Baccho Ka Patra - बच्चों का पत्र
chapters.content: This chapter is about the letters children write to others, reflecting their thoughts, desires, and innocence.

chapters.title: Mirch Ka Maza - मिर्च का मज़ा
chapters.content: A humorous chapter about the taste of chili, using the context of a child’s experience with something spicy.

chapters.title: Sabse Accha Ped - सबसे अच्छा पेड़ (Part 1)
chapters.content: A story about a tree and its significance, emphasizing how nature provides for everyone.

chapters.title: Sabse Accha Ped - सबसे अच्छा पेड़ (Part 2)
chapters.content: The continuation of the tree’s story, teaching children the importance of preserving nature.

chapters.title: Pattiyon Ka Chidiyaghar - पत्तियों का चिड़ियाघर
chapters.content: A fun story about the different creatures that live on tree leaves, helping children understand the importance of nature’s diversity.

chapters.title: Nana Nani Ke Naam - नाना नानी के नाम
chapters.content: A nostalgic story about grandparents, showing their importance in a child’s life.
